verses.verse: וַתֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לָ֖הּ נָעֳמִ֣י <S%H5281><s%> Then Naomi חֲמוֹתָ֑הּ <S%H2545><s%> her mother in law בִּתִּ֞י <S%H1323><s%> unto her My daughter הֲלֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> not אֲבַקֶּשׁ־ <S%H1245><s%> shall I not seek לָ֛ךְ מָנ֖וֹחַ <S%H4494><s%> rest אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> that it יִֽיטַב־ <S%H3190><s%> for thee that it may be well לָֽךְ׃

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now הֲלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> is not בֹ֙עַז֙ <S%H1162><s%> And now [is] not Boaz מֹֽדַעְתָּ֔נוּ <S%H4130><s%> of our kindred אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whose הָיִ֖ית <S%H1961><s%> become אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for נַעֲרוֹתָ֑יו <S%H5291><s%> with whose maidens הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he זֹרֶ֛ה <S%H2219><s%> thou wast? Behold he winnoweth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גֹּ֥רֶן <S%H1637><s%> in the threshingfloor הַשְּׂעֹרִ֖ים <S%H8184><s%> barley הַלָּֽיְלָה׃ <S%H3915><s%> to night

וְרָחַ֣צְתְּ ׀ <S%H7364><s%> Wash וָסַ֗כְתְּ <S%H5480><s%> thyself therefore and anoint וְשַׂ֧מְתְּ <S%H7760><s%> thee and put [שִׂמְלֹתֵךְ כ] (שִׂמְלֹתַ֛יִךְ <S%H8071><s%> apparel ק) עָלַ֖יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> and [וְיָרַדְתִּי כ] (וְיָרַ֣דְתְּ <S%H3381><s%> descend ק) הַגֹּ֑רֶן <S%H1637><s%> to the floor אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּוָּדְעִ֣י <S%H3045><s%> [but] make not thyself known לָאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> unto the man עַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> until כַּלֹּת֖וֹ <S%H3615><s%> until he shall have done לֶאֱכֹ֥ל <S%H398><s%> eating וְלִשְׁתּֽוֹת׃ <S%H8354><s%> and drinking

וִיהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> become בְשָׁכְב֗וֹ <S%H7901><s%> And it shall be when he lieth down וְיָדַ֙עַתְּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> that thou shalt mark אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמָּקוֹם֙ <S%H4725><s%> the place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> what יִשְׁכַּב־ <S%H7901><s%> where he shall lie שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> and you וּבָ֛את <S%H935><s%> and thou shalt go in וְגִלִּ֥ית <S%H1540><s%> and uncover מַרְגְּלֹתָ֖יו <S%H4772><s%> his feet [וְשָׁכָבְתִּי כ] (וְשָׁכָ֑בְתְּ <S%H7901><s%> down ק) וְהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he יַגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> and he will tell לָ֔ךְ אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> what תַּעַשִֽׂין׃ <S%H6213><s%> thee what thou shalt do

וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And she said אֵלֶ֑יהָ <S%H413><s%> to her כֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> All אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> you תֹּאמְרִ֥י <S%H559><s%> unto her All that thou sayest (אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> about ק) אֶֽעֱשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> unto me I will do

וַתֵּ֖רֶד <S%H3381><s%> And she went down הַגֹּ֑רֶן <S%H1637><s%> unto the floor וַתַּ֕עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> and did כְּכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after צִוַּ֖תָּה <S%H6680><s%> bade חֲמוֹתָֽהּ׃ <S%H2545><s%> according to all that her mother in law

וַיֹּ֨אכַל <S%H398><s%> had eaten בֹּ֤עַז <S%H1162><s%> And when Boaz וַיֵּשְׁתְּ֙ <S%H8354><s%> and drunk וַיִּיטַ֣ב <S%H3190><s%> was merry לִבּ֔וֹ <S%H3820><s%> and his heart וַיָּבֹ֕א <S%H935><s%> he went לִשְׁכַּ֖ב <S%H7901><s%> to lie down בִּקְצֵ֣ה <S%H7097><s%> at the end הָעֲרֵמָ֑ה <S%H6194><s%> of the heap of corn וַתָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> and she came בַלָּ֔ט <S%H3909><s%> softly וַתְּגַ֥ל <S%H1540><s%> and uncovered מַרְגְּלֹתָ֖יו <S%H4772><s%> his feet וַתִּשְׁכָּֽב׃ <S%H7901><s%> and laid her down

וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> happened בַּחֲצִ֣י <S%H2677><s%> the middle הַלַּ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> of the night וַיֶּחֱרַ֥ד <S%H2729><s%> was afraid הָאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> that the man וַיִּלָּפֵ֑ת <S%H3943><s%> and turned וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold אִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> himself and behold a woman שֹׁכֶ֖בֶת <S%H7901><s%> lay מַרְגְּלֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H4772><s%> at his feet

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who אָ֑תּ <S%H859><s%> and she וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Who [art] thou? And she answered אָנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> I ר֣וּת <S%H7327><s%> I [am] Ruth אֲמָתֶ֔ךָ <S%H519><s%> thine handmaid וּפָרַשְׂתָּ֤ <S%H6566><s%> spread כְנָפֶ֙ךָ֙ <S%H3671><s%> therefore thy skirt עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over אֲמָ֣תְךָ֔ <S%H519><s%> over thine handmaid כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> are a גֹאֵ֖ל <S%H1350><s%> for thou [art] a near kinsman אָֽתָּה׃ <S%H859><s%> he

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said בְּרוּכָ֨ה <S%H1288><s%> Blessed אַ֤תְּ <S%H859><s%> you לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God בִּתִּ֔י <S%H1323><s%> my daughter הֵיטַ֛בְתְּ <S%H3190><s%> [for] thou hast shewed חַסְדֵּ֥ךְ <S%H2617><s%> more kindness הָאַחֲר֖וֹן <S%H314><s%> in the latter end מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> than הָרִאשׁ֑וֹן <S%H7223><s%> than at the beginning לְבִלְתִּי־ <S%H1115><s%> not לֶ֗כֶת <S%H1980><s%> going אַחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> after הַבַּ֣חוּרִ֔ים <S%H970><s%> young men אִם־ <S%H518><s%> whether דַּ֖ל <S%H1800><s%> whether poor וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> or עָשִֽׁיר׃ <S%H6223><s%> or rich

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now בִּתִּי֙ <S%H1323><s%> And now my daughter אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּ֣ירְאִ֔י <S%H3372><s%> fear כֹּ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> for all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> you תֹּאמְרִ֖י <S%H559><s%> to thee all that thou requirest אֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> not I will do לָּ֑ךְ כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for יוֹדֵ֙עַ֙ <S%H3045><s%> doth know כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> for all the city עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> of my people כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> woman חַ֖יִל <S%H2428><s%> that thou [art] a virtuous אָֽתְּ׃ <S%H859><s%> you

וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> Now כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אָמְנָ֔ם <S%H551><s%> And now it is true כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for [אִם <S%H518><s%> lo כ] גֹאֵ֖ל <S%H1350><s%> that I [am thy] near kinsman אָנֹ֑כִי <S%H595><s%> I וְגַ֛ם <S%H1571><s%> however יֵ֥שׁ <S%H3426><s%> howbeit there is גֹּאֵ֖ל <S%H1350><s%> a kinsman קָר֥וֹב <S%H7138><s%> nearer מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <S%H4480><s%> than

לִ֣ינִי ׀ <S%H3885><s%> Tarry הַלַּ֗יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> this night וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> comes בַבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <S%H1242><s%> and it shall be in the morning אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if יִגְאָלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1350><s%> [that] if he will perform unto thee the part of a kinsman טוֹב֙ <S%H2896><s%> well יִגְאָ֔ל <S%H1350><s%> let him do the kinsman's part וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> does not יַחְפֹּ֧ץ <S%H2654><s%> but if he will לְגָֽאֳלֵ֛ךְ <S%H1350><s%> not do the part of a kinsman וּגְאַלְתִּ֥יךְ <S%H1350><s%> to thee then will I do the part of a kinsman אָנֹ֖כִי <S%H595><s%> I חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> to thee [as] the LORD שִׁכְבִ֖י <S%H7901><s%> lie down עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הַבֹּֽקֶר׃ <S%H1242><s%> until the morning

וַתִּשְׁכַּ֤ב <S%H7901><s%> And she lay [מַרְגְּלָתַו כ] (מַרְגְּלֹותָיו֙ <S%H4772><s%> feet ק) עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הַבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> until the morning וַתָּ֕קָם <S%H6965><s%> and she rose up [בִּטְרֹום כ] (בְּטֶ֛רֶם <S%H2958><s%> before ק) יַכִּ֥יר <S%H5234><s%> could know אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> one אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֵעֵ֑הוּ <S%H7453><s%> another וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And he said אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יִוָּדַ֔ע <S%H3045><s%> Let it not be known כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בָ֥אָה <S%H935><s%> came הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> that a woman הַגֹּֽרֶן׃ <S%H1637><s%> into the floor

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Also he said הָ֠בִי <S%H3051><s%> Bring הַמִּטְפַּ֧חַת <S%H4304><s%> the vail אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> that עָלַ֛יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> is on וְאֶֽחֳזִי־ <S%H270><s%> that [thou hast] upon thee and hold בָ֖הּ וַתֹּ֣אחֶז <S%H270><s%> it And when she held בָּ֑הּ וַיָּ֤מָד <S%H4058><s%> it he measured שֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> six שְׂעֹרִים֙ <S%H8184><s%> [measures] of barley וַיָּ֣שֶׁת <S%H7896><s%> and laid עָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> [it] on her and she went הָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> into the city

וַתָּבוֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> And when she came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to her חֲמוֹתָ֔הּ <S%H2545><s%> to her mother in law וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> she said מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> How אַ֣תְּ <S%H859><s%> you בִּתִּ֑י <S%H1323><s%> first וַתַּ֨גֶּד־ <S%H5046><s%> bewray לָ֔הּ אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> her all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after עָֽשָׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> had done לָ֖הּ הָאִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> her all that the man

וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And she said שֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> These six הַשְּׂעֹרִ֥ים <S%H8184><s%> [measures] of barley הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These נָ֣תַן <S%H5414><s%> gave לִ֑י כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> he me for he said (אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> about ק) אַל־ <S%H413><s%> about תָּב֥וֹאִי <S%H935><s%> to me Go רֵיקָ֖ם <S%H7387><s%> not empty אֶל־ <S%H408><s%> nay חֲמוֹתֵֽךְ׃ <S%H2545><s%> unto thy mother in law

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> Then said שְׁבִ֣י <S%H3427><s%> she Sit still בִתִּ֔י <S%H1323><s%> my daughter עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> against אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> you תֵּֽדְעִ֔ין <S%H3045><s%> until thou know אֵ֖יךְ <S%H349><s%> how יִפֹּ֣ל <S%H5307><s%> will fall דָּבָ֑ר <S%H1697><s%> how the matter כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> will not יִשְׁקֹט֙ <S%H8252><s%> will not be in rest הָאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> for the man כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> until כִּלָּ֥ה <S%H3615><s%> he have finished הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> the thing הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> this day
